name: philoprogenitive
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Someone who is philoprogenitive likes to have a lot of children: With seven children, they must be one of the most philoprogenitive families in the district. As a result of their philoprogenitive tendencies, their home was always overcrowded and chaotic.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was one of the most philoprogenitive individuals ever to have lived, and has over two million living descendants.Most of the people in the colony were religiously devout, sober, and philoprogenitive.She remained childless, in contrast to her philoprogenitive siblings.
